Perfeito! Analisando sua estrutura de projeto, vejo que voc√™ tem um player de m√∫sica Android com m√∫ltiplos **Product Flavors** (universal, arm64, x86_64) e **Build Types** (release, userdebug). 

Vou criar um script otimizado para compilar **todas as vers√µes release** dispon√≠veis:

```diff

+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ # ========================================
+ # SCRIPT COMPLETO - TODAS AS VERS√ïES RELEASE
+ # ========================================
+ 
+ set -e
+ 
+ # Cores para output
+ RED='\033[0;31m'
+ GREEN='\033[0;32m'
+ YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
+ BLUE='\033[0;34m'
+ PURPLE='\033[0;35m'
+ NC='\033[0m'
+ 
+ # Fun√ß√£o para imprimir com cores
+ print_status() {
+     echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $1"
+ }
+ 
+ print_success() {
+     echo -e "${GREEN}[SUCCESS]${NC} $1"
+ }
+ 
+ print_warning() {
+     echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"
+ }
+ 
+ print_error() {
+     echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
+ }
+ 
+ print_building() {
+     echo -e "${PURPLE}[BUILDING]${NC} $1"
+ }
+ 
+ # Verificar mem√≥ria dispon√≠vel
+ check_memory() {
+     local mem_total=$(grep MemTotal /proc/meminfo | awk '{print $2}')
+     local mem_available=$(grep MemAvailable /proc/meminfo | awk '{print $2}')
+     local mem_total_gb=$((mem_total / 1024 / 1024))
+     local mem_available_gb=$((mem_available / 1024 / 1024))
+     
+     print_status "üíæ Mem√≥ria total: ${mem_total_gb}GB"
+     print_status "üÜì Mem√≥ria dispon√≠vel: ${mem_available_gb}GB"
+     
+     if [ $mem_available_gb -lt 4 ]; then
+         print_warning "‚ö†Ô∏è  Pouca mem√≥ria dispon√≠vel (${mem_available_gb}GB). Recomenda-se pelo menos 4GB livres."
+         print_warning "üîß Usando configura√ß√µes conservadoras..."
+         return 1
+     fi
+     return 0
+ }
+ 
+ # Limpeza antes do build
+ cleanup_system() {
+     print_status "üßπ Limpando sistema antes dos builds..."
+     
+     # Parar todos os daemons Gradle
+     ./gradlew --stop || true
+     
+     # Aguardar daemons pararem
+     sleep 2
+     
+     # Matar processos Gradle √≥rf√£os
+     pkill -f "GradleDaemon" 2>/dev/null || true
+     pkill -f "KotlinCompileDaemon" 2>/dev/null || true
+     
+     # Limpar builds anteriores
+     ./gradlew clean --no-daemon --max-workers=1
+     
+     print_success "‚úÖ Sistema limpo!"
+ }
+ 
+ # Configurar ambiente otimizado
+ setup_environment() {
+     local has_enough_memory=$1
+     
+     if [ $has_enough_memory -eq 0 ]; then
+         # Sistema com mem√≥ria suficiente
+         export GRADLE_OPTS="-Xmx4096m -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=200"
+         export KOTLIN_DAEMON_OPTS="-Xmx2048m -XX:+UseG1GC"
+         MAX_WORKERS=3
+         print_status "üöÄ Configura√ß√£o normal ativada (mem√≥ria suficiente)"
+     else
+         # Sistema com pouca mem√≥ria
+         export GRADLE_OPTS="-Xmx3072m -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=200"
+         export KOTLIN_DAEMON_OPTS="-Xmx1536m -XX:+UseG1GC"
+         MAX_WORKERS=2
+         print_status "‚ö° Configura√ß√£o conservadora ativada (pouca mem√≥ria)"
+     fi
+ }
+ 
+ # Build individual de uma variante
+ build_variant() {
+     local variant_name=$1
+     local build_type=$2
+     local full_variant="${variant_name}${build_type}"
+     
+     print_building "üî® Compilando: $full_variant"
+     
+     # Limpar daemons antes de cada build para controlar mem√≥ria
+     ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+     sleep 1
+     
+     # Comando de build otimizado
+     local build_cmd="./gradlew"
+     build_cmd+=" --no-daemon"
+     build_cmd+=" --max-workers=$MAX_WORKERS"
+     build_cmd+=" --parallel"
+     build_cmd+=" --configure-on-demand"
+     build_cmd+=" --build-cache"
+     build_cmd+=" assemble$full_variant"
+     
+     # Executar com timeout de 45 minutos
+     if timeout 2700 $build_cmd; then
+         print_success "‚úÖ $full_variant compilado com sucesso!"
+         return 0
+     else
+         print_error "‚ùå Falha ao compilar $full_variant"
+         return 1
+     fi
+ }
+ 
+ # Mostrar informa√ß√µes dos APKs gerados
+ show_build_results() {
+     local apk_dir="app/build/outputs/apk"
+     
+     echo
+     print_status "üì± RESUMO DOS BUILDS GERADOS:"
+     print_status "================================"
+     
+     if [ -d "$apk_dir" ]; then
+         local total_size=0
+         local apk_count=0
+         
+         find "$apk_dir" -name "*.apk" -type f | while read apk_file; do
+             local size=$(stat -c%s "$apk_file")
+             local size_mb=$((size / 1024 / 1024))
+             local basename=$(basename "$apk_file")
+             
+             echo -e "${GREEN}üì¶${NC} $basename (${size_mb}MB)"
+             
+             # Mostrar localiza√ß√£o completa
+             echo -e "   üìç $apk_file"
+             
+             # Mostrar hash para verifica√ß√£o
+             local hash=$(sha256sum "$apk_file" | cut -d' ' -f1 | cut -c1-16)
+             echo -e "   üîê SHA256: $hash..."
+             echo
+         done
+         
+         echo
+         print_success "üéâ Todos os builds conclu√≠dos!"
+         print_status "üìÇ APKs dispon√≠veis em: $apk_dir"
+         
+     else
+         print_error "‚ùå Diret√≥rio de APKs n√£o encontrado!"
+     fi
+ }
+ 
+ # Menu de sele√ß√£o
+ show_menu() {
+     echo
+     print_status "üéµ === BUILD TODAS AS VERS√ïES RELEASE - SonsPhere ==="
+     echo "1Ô∏è‚É£  Compilar TODOS os releases (6 variantes)"
+     echo "2Ô∏è‚É£  Compilar apenas Release builds (3 variantes)"
+     echo "3Ô∏è‚É£  Compilar apenas UserDebug builds (3 variantes)"
+     echo "4Ô∏è‚É£  Compilar apenas Universal (release + userdebug)"
+     echo "5Ô∏è‚É£  Compilar apenas ARM64 (release + userdebug)"
+     echo "6Ô∏è‚É£  Compilar apenas x86_64 (release + userdebug)"
+     echo "7Ô∏è‚É£  Verificar status do sistema"
+     echo "8Ô∏è‚É£  Limpeza completa e sair"
+     echo "0Ô∏è‚É£  Sair"
+     echo
+ }
+ 
+ # Compilar todas as variantes
+ build_all_variants() {
+     local build_types=("$@")
+     local flavors=("Universal" "Arm64" "X86_64")
+     local success_count=0
+     local total_count=0
+     local failed_builds=()
+     
+     print_status "üöÄ Iniciando compila√ß√£o de todas as variantes..."
+     
+     for build_type in "${build_types[@]}"; do
+         for flavor in "${flavors[@]}"; do
+             total_count=$((total_count + 1))
+             
+             print_status "üìä Progresso: $total_count de $((${#build_types[@]} * ${#flavors[@]}))"
+             
+             if build_variant "$flavor" "$build_type"; then
+                 success_count=$((success_count + 1))
+             else
+                 failed_builds+=("$flavor$build_type")
+                 # Tentar limpar mem√≥ria antes de continuar
+                 ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+                 pkill -f "GradleDaemon" 2>/dev/null || true
+                 sleep 3
+             fi
+             
+             # Pequena pausa entre builds para estabilizar
+             sleep 2
+         done
+     done
+     
+     echo
+     print_status "üìà RELAT√ìRIO FINAL:"
+     print_success "‚úÖ Sucessos: $success_count de $total_count"
+     
+     if [ ${#failed_builds[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
+         print_error "‚ùå Falhas: ${failed_builds[*]}"
+     fi
+ }
+ 
+ # Fun√ß√£o principal
+ main() {
+     cd "$(dirname "$0")"
+     
+     print_status "üéµ SonsPhere - Build Todas as Vers√µes Release"
+     print_status "=============================================="
+     
+     # Verificar se estamos no diret√≥rio correto
+     if [ ! -f "gradlew" ]; then
+         print_error "‚ùå gradlew n√£o encontrado. Execute na raiz do projeto."
+         exit 1
+     fi
+     
+     # Verificar mem√≥ria e configurar ambiente
+     if check_memory; then
+         setup_environment 0
+     else
+         setup_environment 1
+     fi
+     
+     # Menu interativo se n√£o houver argumentos
+     if [ $# -eq 0 ]; then
+         while true; do
+             show_menu
+             read -p "Escolha uma op√ß√£o: " choice
+             
+             case $choice in
+                 1)
+                     cleanup_system
+                     build_all_variants "Release" "Userdebug"
+                     show_build_results
+                     ;;
+                 2)
+                     cleanup_system
+                     build_all_variants "Release"
+                     show_build_results
+                     ;;
+                 3)
+                     cleanup_system
+                     build_all_variants "Userdebug"
+                     show_build_results
+                     ;;
+                 4)
+                     cleanup_system
+                     build_all_variants "Release" "Userdebug"
+                     show_build_results
+                     ;;
+                 5)
+                     cleanup_system
+                     for build_type in "Release" "Userdebug"; do
+                         build_variant "Arm64" "$build_type"
+                     done
+                     show_build_results
+                     ;;
+                 6)
+                     cleanup_system
+                     for build_type in "Release" "Userdebug"; do
+                         build_variant "X86_64" "$build_type"
+                     done
+                     show_build_results
+                     ;;
+                 7)
+                     check_memory
+                     df -h .
+                     echo
+                     print_status "üìä Processos Gradle ativos:"
+                     ps aux | grep -i gradle | grep -v grep || echo "Nenhum"
+                     ;;
+                 8)
+                     print_status "üßπ Limpeza completa..."
+                     ./gradlew --stop
+                     ./gradlew clean --no-daemon
+                     rm -rf "$HOME/.gradle/caches" 2>/dev/null || true
+                     print_success "‚úÖ Sistema limpo!"
+                     exit 0
+                     ;;
+                 0)
+                     print_status "üëã Saindo..."
+                     exit 0
+                     ;;
+                 *)
+                     print_error "‚ùå Op√ß√£o inv√°lida!"
+                     ;;
+             esac
+         done
+     else
+         # Modo n√£o-interativo - compilar tudo
+         cleanup_system
+         build_all_variants "Release" "Userdebug"
+         show_build_results
+     fi
+ }
+ 
+ # Trap para limpeza em caso de interrup√ß√£o
+ trap 'print_warning "‚ö†Ô∏è Build interrompido pelo usu√°rio"; ./gradlew --stop; exit 1' INT TERM
+ 
+ # Verificar depend√™ncias
+ command -v timeout >/dev/null 2>&1 || { print_error "‚ùå 'timeout' n√£o encontrado. Instale: sudo apt-get install coreutils"; exit 1; }
+ 
+ # Executar fun√ß√£o principal
+ main "$@" 
```

---



---

Vou criar uma vers√£o mais simples e robusta que resolve o problema do `JAVA_HOME` automaticamente:

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ # ========================================
+ # SCRIPT SIMPLES - TODAS AS VERS√ïES RELEASE
+ # ========================================
+ 
+ # Configura√ß√£o autom√°tica do JAVA_HOME
+ if [ -d "/opt/jdk-24.0.1" ]; then
+     export JAVA_HOME="/opt/jdk-24.0.1"
+ elif [ -d "/usr/lib/jvm/java-21-openjdk-amd64" ]; then
+     export JAVA_HOME="/usr/lib/jvm/java-21-openjdk-amd64"
+ elif [ -d "/usr/lib/jvm/default-java" ]; then
+     export JAVA_HOME="/usr/lib/jvm/default-java"
+ else
+     # Encontrar Java automaticamente
+     JAVA_PATH=$(which java)
+     if [ -n "$JAVA_PATH" ]; then
+         export JAVA_HOME=$(readlink -f "$JAVA_PATH" | sed 's|/bin/java||')
+     fi
+ fi
+ 
+ echo "üîß JAVA_HOME configurado para: $JAVA_HOME"
+ echo "‚òï Vers√£o do Java:"
+ java -version
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üéµ === COMPILA√á√ÉO TODAS AS VERS√ïES RELEASE ==="
+ echo "=============================================="
+ 
+ # Limpeza
+ echo "üßπ Limpando builds anteriores..."
+ JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew clean --no-daemon
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üöÄ Iniciando compila√ß√£o de todas as vers√µes..."
+ 
+ # Lista de todas as variantes para compilar
+ VARIANTS=(
+     "assembleUniversalRelease"
+     "assembleArm64Release" 
+     "assembleX86_64Release"
+     "assembleUniversalUserdebug"
+     "assembleArm64Userdebug"
+     "assembleX86_64Userdebug"
+ )
+ 
+ SUCCESS_COUNT=0
+ FAILED_BUILDS=()
+ 
+ # Compilar cada variante
+ for i in "${!VARIANTS[@]}"; do
+     VARIANT="${VARIANTS[$i]}"
+     CURRENT=$((i + 1))
+     TOTAL=${#VARIANTS[@]}
+     
+     echo
+     echo "üìä [$CURRENT/$TOTAL] Compilando: $VARIANT"
+     echo "‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ"
+     
+     # Comando de build com configura√ß√µes seguras
+     if JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" timeout 3600 ./gradlew \
+         --no-daemon \
+         --max-workers=2 \
+         --parallel \
+         --build-cache \
+         --configure-on-demand \
+         -Dorg.gradle.jvmargs="-Xmx3584m -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=200" \
+         -Dkotlin.daemon.jvmargs="-Xmx2048m -XX:+UseG1GC" \
+         "$VARIANT"; then
+         
+         echo "‚úÖ $VARIANT - SUCESSO!"
+         SUCCESS_COUNT=$((SUCCESS_COUNT + 1))
+     else
+         echo "‚ùå $VARIANT - FALHOU!"
+         FAILED_BUILDS+=("$VARIANT")
+         
+         # Limpeza ap√≥s falha
+         JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+         sleep 2
+     fi
+ done
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üèÅ COMPILA√á√ÉO FINALIZADA!"
+ echo "========================="
+ echo "‚úÖ Sucessos: $SUCCESS_COUNT de ${#VARIANTS[@]}"
+ 
+ if [ ${#FAILED_BUILDS[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
+     echo "‚ùå Falhas: ${FAILED_BUILDS[*]}"
+ fi
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üì± APKs gerados:"
+ if [ -d "app/build/outputs/apk" ]; then
+     find app/build/outputs/apk -name "*.apk" -type f | while read apk; do
+         SIZE=$(du -h "$apk" | cut -f1)
+         echo "üì¶ $(basename "$apk") - $SIZE"
+         echo "   üìç $apk"
+     done
+ else
+     echo "‚ùå Nenhum APK encontrado"
+ fi
+ 
+ # Limpeza final
+ JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üéâ Processo finalizado!" 
```

Agora vou criar um script mais r√°pido que compila apenas as vers√µes essenciais:

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ # ========================================
+ # COMPILA√á√ÉO APENAS VERS√ïES ESSENCIAIS - MAIS R√ÅPIDO
+ # ========================================
+ 
+ # Auto configurar JAVA_HOME
+ if [ -d "/opt/jdk-24.0.1" ]; then
+     export JAVA_HOME="/opt/jdk-24.0.1"
+ elif [ -d "/usr/lib/jvm/default-java" ]; then
+     export JAVA_HOME="/usr/lib/jvm/default-java"
+ else
+     JAVA_PATH=$(which java)
+     if [ -n "$JAVA_PATH" ]; then
+         export JAVA_HOME=$(readlink -f "$JAVA_PATH" | sed 's|/bin/java||')
+     fi
+ fi
+ 
+ echo "üîß JAVA_HOME: $JAVA_HOME"
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üéµ === COMPILA√á√ÉO R√ÅPIDA - VERS√ïES ESSENCIAIS ==="
+ echo "=============================================="
+ 
+ # Limpeza r√°pida
+ echo "üßπ Limpeza..."
+ JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üöÄ Compilando apenas vers√µes Release essenciais..."
+ echo "   üì± Universal Release (todas as arquiteturas)"
+ echo "   üì± ARM64 Release (apenas ARM64)"
+ 
+ # Lista das vers√µes essenciais
+ BUILDS=(
+     "assembleUniversalRelease:Universal Release"
+     "assembleArm64Release:ARM64 Release"
+ )
+ 
+ SUCCESS=0
+ TOTAL=${#BUILDS[@]}
+ 
+ for build_info in "${BUILDS[@]}"; do
+     TASK=${build_info%%:*}
+     NAME=${build_info##*:}
+     
+     echo
+     echo "‚ö° Compilando: $NAME"
+     echo "‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ"
+     
+     if JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" timeout 2400 ./gradlew \
+         --no-daemon \
+         --max-workers=3 \
+         --parallel \
+         --build-cache \
+         -Dorg.gradle.jvmargs="-Xmx4096m -XX:+UseG1GC" \
+         "$TASK"; then
+         
+         echo "‚úÖ $NAME - SUCESSO!"
+         SUCCESS=$((SUCCESS + 1))
+     else
+         echo "‚ùå $NAME - FALHOU!"
+         JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+     fi
+ done
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üèÅ RESULTADO FINAL:"
+ echo "=================="
+ echo "‚úÖ Sucessos: $SUCCESS de $TOTAL"
+ 
+ if [ $SUCCESS -gt 0 ]; then
+     echo
+     echo "üì± APKs gerados:"
+     if [ -d "app/build/outputs/apk" ]; then
+         find app/build/outputs/apk -name "*Release*.apk" -type f | while read apk; do
+             SIZE=$(du -h "$apk" | cut -f1)
+             echo "üì¶ $(basename "$apk") ($SIZE)"
+         done
+     fi
+ fi
+ 
+ JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ echo "üéâ Processo finalizado!" 
```

Perfeito! O arquivo debug est√° OK. Agora vou criar um script **ultra-simples** que vai compilar uma vers√£o por vez de forma direta:

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ echo "üéµ COMPILA√á√ÉO DIRETA - SonsPhere"
+ echo "================================"
+ 
+ # Configurar JAVA_HOME automaticamente
+ export JAVA_HOME="/opt/jdk-24.0.1"
+ 
+ echo "üîß Java: $JAVA_HOME"
+ echo "üöÄ Compilando Universal Release..."
+ 
+ # Parar processos
+ ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ 
+ # Compilar diretamente sem cache para evitar problemas
+ JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew assembleUniversalRelease \
+     --no-daemon \
+     --no-build-cache \
+     --rerun-tasks \
+     --max-workers=2 \
+     -Dorg.gradle.jvmargs="-Xmx3584m -XX:+UseG1GC"
+ 
+ if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
+     echo
+     echo "‚úÖ SUCESSO! APK gerado:"
+     find app/build/outputs/apk -name "*universal*release*.apk" -type f | head -1 | while read apk; do
+         SIZE=$(du -h "$apk" | cut -f1)
+         echo "üì¶ $(basename "$apk") ($SIZE)"
+         echo "üìç $apk"
+     done
+ else
+     echo "‚ùå FALHOU!"
+ fi
+ 
+ ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true 
```

üéâ **EXCELENTE!** Funcionou! O primeiro APK foi compilado com sucesso! 

Agora vou criar o script final para compilar **todas as vers√µes release** de forma confi√°vel:

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ echo "üéµ COMPILA√á√ÉO COMPLETA - TODAS AS VERS√ïES RELEASE"
+ echo "================================================"
+ echo "üì± SonsPhere v25.06.1"
+ echo
+ 
+ # Configurar JAVA_HOME
+ export JAVA_HOME="/opt/jdk-24.0.1"
+ echo "üîß Java: $JAVA_HOME"
+ 
+ # Lista de todas as vers√µes para compilar
+ VERSIONS=(
+     "assembleUniversalRelease:Universal Release (todas arquiteturas)"
+     "assembleArm64Release:ARM64 Release (apenas ARM64)"
+     "assembleX86_64Release:x86_64 Release (apenas x86_64)"
+     "assembleUniversalUserdebug:Universal UserDebug (todas arquiteturas)"
+     "assembleArm64Userdebug:ARM64 UserDebug (apenas ARM64)"
+     "assembleX86_64Userdebug:x86_64 UserDebug (apenas x86_64)"
+ )
+ 
+ SUCCESS_COUNT=0
+ FAILED_BUILDS=()
+ START_TIME=$(date +%s)
+ 
+ echo "üöÄ Iniciando compila√ß√£o de ${#VERSIONS[@]} vers√µes..."
+ echo
+ 
+ # Parar processos
+ ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ 
+ # Compilar cada vers√£o
+ for i in "${!VERSIONS[@]}"; do
+     VERSION="${VERSIONS[$i]}"
+     TASK="${VERSION%%:*}"
+     NAME="${VERSION##*:}"
+     CURRENT=$((i + 1))
+     TOTAL=${#VERSIONS[@]}
+     
+     echo "[$CURRENT/$TOTAL] üî® Compilando: $NAME"
+     echo "‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ"
+     
+     START_BUILD=$(date +%s)
+     
+     if JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" timeout 3600 ./gradlew "$TASK" \
+         --no-daemon \
+         --no-build-cache \
+         --max-workers=2 \
+         -Dorg.gradle.jvmargs="-Xmx3584m -XX:+UseG1GC" \
+         --quiet; then
+         
+         END_BUILD=$(date +%s)
+         BUILD_TIME=$((END_BUILD - START_BUILD))
+         
+         echo "‚úÖ $NAME - SUCESSO! (${BUILD_TIME}s)"
+         SUCCESS_COUNT=$((SUCCESS_COUNT + 1))
+     else
+         echo "‚ùå $NAME - FALHOU!"
+         FAILED_BUILDS+=("$NAME")
+         
+         # Limpar ap√≥s falha
+         ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+         sleep 2
+     fi
+     
+     echo
+ done
+ 
+ # Estat√≠sticas finais
+ END_TIME=$(date +%s)
+ TOTAL_TIME=$((END_TIME - START_TIME))
+ MINUTES=$((TOTAL_TIME / 60))
+ SECONDS=$((TOTAL_TIME % 60))
+ 
+ echo "üèÅ COMPILA√á√ÉO FINALIZADA!"
+ echo "========================="
+ echo "‚è±Ô∏è  Tempo total: ${MINUTES}m ${SECONDS}s"
+ echo "‚úÖ Sucessos: $SUCCESS_COUNT de ${#VERSIONS[@]}"
+ 
+ if [ ${#FAILED_BUILDS[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
+     echo "‚ùå Falhas: ${FAILED_BUILDS[*]}"
+ fi
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üì± APKs gerados:"
+ if [ -d "app/build/outputs/apk" ]; then
+     echo
+     find app/build/outputs/apk -name "*.apk" -type f | sort | while read apk; do
+         SIZE=$(du -h "$apk" | cut -f1)
+         BASENAME=$(basename "$apk")
+         echo "üì¶ $BASENAME ($SIZE)"
+         echo "   üìç $apk"
+         echo
+     done
+     
+     # Calcular tamanho total
+     TOTAL_SIZE=$(find app/build/outputs/apk -name "*.apk" -type f -exec du -b {} + | awk '{sum += $1} END {printf "%.1f MB", sum/1024/1024}')
+     echo "üìä Tamanho total: $TOTAL_SIZE"
+ else
+     echo "‚ùå Nenhum APK encontrado"
+ fi
+ 
+ # Limpeza final
+ ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ 
+ echo
+ if [ $SUCCESS_COUNT -eq ${#VERSIONS[@]} ]; then
+     echo "üéâ TODAS AS VERS√ïES COMPILADAS COM SUCESSO!"
+ else
+     echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Algumas vers√µes falharam, mas voc√™ tem $SUCCESS_COUNT APKs prontos!"
+ fi
+ 
+ echo "üìÇ Localiza√ß√£o: app/build/outputs/apk/" 
```

Perfeito! Vou compilar especificamente a **vers√£o ARM64** que √© a mais eficiente para celulares Android modernos e depois te mostrar como instalar:

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/bin/bash
+ 
+ echo "üì± COMPILA√á√ÉO ARM64 - SonsPhere para Celular"
+ echo "============================================"
+ 
+ # Configurar JAVA_HOME
+ export JAVA_HOME="/opt/jdk-24.0.1"
+ echo "üîß Java: $JAVA_HOME"
+ echo "üéØ Target: ARM64 Release (otimizado para celulares)"
+ 
+ # Parar processos
+ ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ 
+ echo
+ echo "üöÄ Compilando vers√£o ARM64..."
+ 
+ # Compilar ARM64 Release
+ if JAVA_HOME="$JAVA_HOME" ./gradlew assembleArm64Release \
+     --no-daemon \
+     --max-workers=3 \
+     --parallel \
+     -Dorg.gradle.jvmargs="-Xmx4096m -XX:+UseG1GC"; then
+     
+     echo
+     echo "‚úÖ ARM64 Release compilado com SUCESSO!"
+     
+     # Encontrar e mostrar o APK
+     ARM64_APK=$(find app/build/outputs/apk -name "*arm64*release*.apk" -type f | head -1)
+     
+     if [ -n "$ARM64_APK" ]; then
+         SIZE=$(du -h "$ARM64_APK" | cut -f1)
+         echo
+         echo "üì¶ APK ARM64 gerado:"
+         echo "   üì± $(basename "$ARM64_APK") ($SIZE)"
+         echo "   üìç $ARM64_APK"
+         
+         # Verificar se adb est√° dispon√≠vel
+         if command -v adb >/dev/null 2>&1; then
+             echo
+             echo "üì≤ Instala√ß√£o no celular:"
+             echo "   1Ô∏è‚É£  Conecte o celular via USB"
+             echo "   2Ô∏è‚É£  Ative 'Depura√ß√£o USB' nas op√ß√µes do desenvolvedor"
+             echo "   3Ô∏è‚É£  Execute: adb install \"$ARM64_APK\""
+             echo
+             echo "üîó Ou execute agora:"
+             echo "   ./instalar_celular.sh"
+         else
+             echo
+             echo "üì≤ Para instalar no celular:"
+             echo "   1Ô∏è‚É£  Transfira o APK para o celular"
+             echo "   2Ô∏è‚É£  Habilite 'Fontes desconhecidas' nas configura√ß√µes"
+             echo "   3Ô∏è‚É£  Toque no APK para instalar"
+         fi
+         
+         # Criar script de instala√ß√£o
+         cat > instalar_celular.sh << EOF
+ #!/bin/bash
+ echo "üì± Instalando SonsPhere no celular..."
+ echo "üîå Verificando conex√£o ADB..."
+ 
+ if ! command -v adb >/dev/null 2>&1; then
+     echo "‚ùå ADB n√£o encontrado. Instale: sudo apt install android-tools-adb"
+     exit 1
+ fi
+ 
+ if ! adb devices | grep -q "device$"; then
+     echo "‚ùå Nenhum dispositivo conectado."
+     echo "   1Ô∏è‚É£  Conecte o celular via USB"
+     echo "   2Ô∏è‚É£  Ative 'Depura√ß√£o USB' nas op√ß√µes do desenvolvedor"
+     echo "   3Ô∏è‚É£  Autorize o computador no celular"
+     exit 1
+ fi
+ 
+ echo "üì≤ Instalando APK..."
+ adb install -r "$ARM64_APK"
+ 
+ if [ \$? -eq 0 ]; then
+     echo "‚úÖ SonsPhere instalado com sucesso!"
+     echo "üéµ Abra o app no celular!"
+ else
+     echo "‚ùå Erro na instala√ß√£o"
+ fi
+ EOF
+         chmod +x instalar_celular.sh
+         
+     else
+         echo "‚ùå APK ARM64 n√£o encontrado!"
+     fi
+     
+ else
+     echo "‚ùå Erro na compila√ß√£o ARM64!"
+ fi
+ 
+ ./gradlew --stop 2>/dev/null || true
+ echo "üèÅ Processo finalizado!" 
```
